thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My NYC home
thread.title_full: My NYC home - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: suzy w
title: My NYC home
text: I stay at the Belleclaire fairly often visiting my daughter at college nearby. I arrive and I feel I have come home. It's absolutely lovely and an especially nice vibe in busy New York. I love staying on the Upper West Side. It's very easy to get anywhere in the city by train or taxi. And being near Central Park is awesome. Tons of restaurants and cafes and great shops on every street. And proximity and ease to get to LaGuardia is a major plus.
